summary:
I\'ve been asked for my settings numerous times for what I use on my ENB. The theme I was shooting towards was immersiveness. Nothing too crazy, nothing too bright, nothing to resource heavy, and no over-powering blur. 

Simply beautiful and immersive.

Alas I\'ve gotten around to posting the settings I use.
descriptionHtml:
~Summary~
The theme with this ENB I was shooting for was immersiveness. Nothing too crazy, nothing too bright, nothing to resource heavy, and no over-powering blur. 

VIDEO:
http://youtu.be/eWON5gVvVZY

-----------------------------------------------------
Simply beautiful and immersive.
-----------------------------------------------------------
~Credits~
I like to post the credits first, as they are the most deserving. First off this is a tweak of ENB Tatsudoshi by Boris Vorontsov and Skyrim Visual Immersion III by Matso mod settings. All credits go to them, and you have to download their mod, from their site. I will not provide their files directly, only links to their site. I only provide my customized settings (that they provided for us users) for their mod. If they don\'t even like having my customizations up, I will respect that and take this off.
Installation Guide
------------------------------------------------

We can do this in EASY 3 STEPS!

1.) Download “0.102 Tatsudoshi” Base Files.
     Link: http://www.enbdev.com/mod_tesskyrim_v0102.htm 
     (Click the little download arrow pointing down)
     Extract to C:\\Program Files\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim (NOT Data)
----------------------------------------------
Okay so we got the base files installed, now for the next mod~
----------------------------------------------

2.) Download Skyrim Visual Immersion III latest version
     Link: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=15050
     OVERWRITE and Extract to C:\\Program Files\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim
------------------------------------------------------

3.) Download \"xXxDOYLExXx ENB\" here one nexus in the file section. 
OVERWRITE and Extract to C:\\Program Files\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim 

-------------------------------------------------------
!!!!!!NOTE!!!!!!!
------------------------------------------------------
Shift + F12 during character creation to get rid of blurr temporarily 

Adjust in-game Brightness to desired level! It will make more things visible.

Green Water Fix 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14007


Want Darker Nights? Download:
Climates Of Tamriel
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17802
*When the NMM Gui Comes up select the hazardous version with
Cool lighting, and Level 2 lighting for nights.

I specifically made this tweak to work with this mod.

Optional: I use my following collection, feel free to make your game look equally amazing by starting here:  http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=22321


There you go! Enjoy!
author: xXxDOYLExXx
